channel.title: CVE Feed for silabs.com -- EFR32 BLE SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for silabs.com -- EFR32 BLE SDK

item.title: CVE-2024-6657|2024-10-11T16:41:06.836Z -- silabs.com -- efr32%20ble%20sdk
item.description: A denial of service may be caused to a single peripheral device in a BLE network when multiple central devices continuously connect and disconnect to the peripheral. A hard reset is required to recover the peripheral device.

item.title: CVE-2024-6657|2024-10-11T13:52:59.562Z -- silabs.com -- efr32%20ble%20sdk
item.description: A denial of service may be caused to a single peripheral device in a BLE network when multiple central devices continuously connect and disconnect to the peripheral. A hard reset is required to recover the peripheral device.
